testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of bigw application
testcase.name: Invalid_login- To validate the login functionality with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in bigw login......................................passed When The user has to click account button...................................passed And The user has to enter the "suganya@gmail.com" and "2455678".............passed And The user has to click "login" button....................................passed Then The user should navigate to the invalid login page.....................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of bigw application

testcase.name: Invalid_register- To validate the registration functionality of the application
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in bigw register page..............................passed When The user click the create new account button...........................passed And The user has to fill the required details...............................passed And The user has to click the "create my account" button....................passed Then The user should navigate to the user profile page......................passed
